vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.14
§ Bilgah = "cheerfulness"
1) a priest of the 15th course, in David's time
2) a priest accompanying Zerubbabel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   clan de sacerdotes; (b) בִּלְגְַי   sacerdote; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
璧迦 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "高興,快活"
1)大衛王時期一個祭司,掣籤的時候是第十五個被抽到 (代上24:14)
2)伴隨所羅巴伯的一個祭司 (尼12:5,18)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
璧迦 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "高兴,快活"
1)大卫王时期一个祭司,掣签的时候是第十五个被抽到 (代上24:14)
2)伴随所罗巴伯的一个祭司 (尼12:5,18)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.10.8; also called Bilgai at Neh.10.8;
Also named: bil.gay (בִּלְגַּי "Bilgai" H1084)
§ Bilgah = "cheerfulness"
1) a priest of the 15th course, in David's time
2) a priest accompanying Zerubbabel
